alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 17 at 7:42PM EST until December 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM MONDAY TO 1 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maine, Central Somerset, Interior Cumberland Highlands, Southern Franklin, and Southern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Western and Central Hillsborough, Cheshire, and Eastern Hillsborough Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Monday to 1 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will blow around unsecured objects and holiday decorations.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford
